title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 31.1 - Federal national mortgage association; government national mortgage association
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 31.1 - Federal national mortgage association; government national mortgage association

State Regulations

The Banking Board hereby authorizes any bank or trust company
which sells or assigns mortgages which it owns to the Federal National Mortgage

Association (FNMA), or the Government National Mortgage Association (GNMA) to
invest in and hold the stock of FNMA and GNMA which it acquires in connection
with making such sale or assignment effective and to do any and all other acts
which under the laws and regulations applicable to such sales may be required
to effect such sales. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
31.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
